title: Journey into the past: the story of the ancient civilizations of the Mediterranean
brief_description: Serves as a historical introduction to the early civilizations around the Mediterranean and provides a geographical background to the histories of Egypt, Greece and Rome. Shows archaeological discoveries including remains of the Roman civilization in Britain. Suitable for secondary level.
